arguments.text: Full‑time employees who have completed at least 12 months of continuous service are eligible for parental leave. Part‑time employees are eligible on a pro‑rated basis after 12 months of service. Eligible employees may take up to 12 weeks of paid parental leave, with the first 6 weeks at 100% salary and the remaining 6 weeks at 70% salary.

messages.content:

- Leave length: Up to 12 weeks paid; first 6 weeks at 100% salary, next 6 weeks at 70% salary.

Here’s a concise summary of the updated **Parental‑Leave Policy** (Policy ID **POL‑PA‑2024‑01**):

- **Eligibility**: Full‑time employees who have completed at least 12 months of continuous service are eligible. Part‑time employees become eligible on a pro‑rated basis after 12 months of service.
- **Leave Duration**: Eligible employees may take up to **12 weeks** of paid parental leave. The first 6 weeks are paid at **100 % salary**, and the remaining 6 weeks at **70 % salary**.
